attributes.action: Decrease the cost of fuel by the same percentage of biofuel that is added to fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to Sky News 89% of people are supposedly unaware of tomorrow's (2008-04-15) introduction of at least 2.5% of biofuel in the petrol and diesel we will be purchasing at the pumps by tomorrow. We, the undersigned propose that the  public is informed of exactly what percentage of fuel is made up of biofuel and that the Government reduces fuel tax by a proportionate amount. For example, the higher the amount of biofuel in petrol, the higher the reduction in petrol tax.
